mapper.select: select u.id as userId, u.username, u.avatar, cm.message as lastMessage, cm.create_time from xg_chat_message cm left join xg_user u on u.id = cm.sender_id and u.del_flag = 0 where cm.del_flag = 0 and cm.receiver_id = #{userId} order by cm.create_time

select ct.id as chatMessageId, ct.sender_id, ct.receiver_id, ct.message, ct.chat_type, ct.create_time, mr.is_read from xg_chat_message ct left join xg_message_read mr on mr.message_id = ct.id and mr.receiver_id = ct.receiver_id where ct.del_flag = 0 and ct.chat_type = 1 and (ct.sender_id = #{senderId} and ct.receiver_id = #{receiverId} or ct.sender_id = #{receiverId} and ct.receiver_id = #{senderId}) order by ct.create_time desc

select cm.id, cm.sender_id, cm.receiver_id, cm.message, cm.is_read, cm.read_time, cm.del_flag, cm.create_by, cm.create_time, cm.update_by, cm.update_time from xg_chat_message cm where cm.del_flag = 0 and cm.sender_id = #{senderId} and cm.receiver_id = #{receiverId} order by cm.create_time desc limit 1

select ct.id as chatMessageId, ct.sender_id, ct.receiver_id, ct.message, ct.chat_type, ct.create_time from xg_chat_message ct where ct.del_flag = 0 and ct.chat_type = 2 and ct.receiver_id = #{groupId} order by ct.create_time desc
